    1: import numpy as np
    2: 
    3: from pandas.core.dtypes.cast import dict_compat
    4: 
    5: from pandas import Timestamp
    6: 
    7: 
    8: def test_dict_compat():
    9:     data_datetime64 = {np.datetime64("1990-03-15"): 1, np.datetime64("2015-03-15"): 2}
   10:     data_unchanged = {1: 2, 3: 4, 5: 6}
   11:     expected = {Timestamp("1990-3-15"): 1, Timestamp("2015-03-15"): 2}
   12:     assert dict_compat(data_datetime64) == expected
   13:     assert dict_compat(expected) == expected
   14:     assert dict_compat(data_unchanged) == data_unchanged
